title: Frontend Developer
shortDescription: Become a job-ready Frontend Developer in 2 years — with a 10-month internship in Sweden, taught in English and free for EU/EEA students.
courseDescription:
This 2-year Higher Vocational Education program in Sweden prepares you for a successful career as a Frontend Developer. The curriculum covers modern web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, version control (Git), responsive design, accessibility, and agile development practices. 

You will gain real-world experience through a 10-month internship (LIA - Learning in a Work Environment) at a Swedish company, giving you a strong connection to the industry and improving your job prospects upon graduation.

The program is entirely taught in English and is tuition-free for EU/EEA citizens. Classes are held on campus in Malmö, providing a dynamic learning environment with close industry ties. Upon completion, you will be awarded a diploma in Higher Vocational Education, recognized across Europe.
requirements: You must have a high school diploma or equivalent, and strong interest in web development. Some basic programming knowledge is recommended. English proficiency (equivalent to B2 level) is required.

title: Backend Developer
shortDescription: Build scalable backend systems using Node.js and PostgreSQL in this intensive vocational program.
courseDescription: This program focuses on backend development using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL. You’ll master API development, authentication, middleware, and cloud deployment. With industry projects and mentorship, you'll be prepared for a backend developer role in modern tech companies.
requirements: Basic JavaScript knowledge and high school diploma. B2-level English recommended.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
shortDescription: Master both frontend and backend skills to become a complete web developer.
courseDescription: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React for frontend, and Node.js with MongoDB for backend. Build complete web applications, deploy them to cloud, and work on capstone projects and internships.
requirements: Motivation and logical thinking. Prior programming knowledge helpful. English B2 required.

title: UI/UX Design
shortDescription: Design intuitive interfaces and improve user experiences using modern tools.
courseDescription: This course covers UI design, UX research, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing using Figma, Adobe XD, and other design systems. Collaborate with developers in multidisciplinary projects.
requirements: Creativity, basic digital skills, and English proficiency (B2). No design background needed.

title: DevOps & Cloud Engineering
shortDescription: Get hands-on with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and major cloud platforms.
courseDescription: Focuses on DevOps culture, infrastructure automation, containerization (Docker), orchestration (Kubernetes), and cloud services (AWS, Azure). Prepares you for real-world DevOps and cloud engineering tasks.
requirements: Familiarity with Linux and scripting. B2 English. Strong motivation to work in cloud/devops roles.

title: Mobile App Development
shortDescription: Develop iOS and Android apps using React Native and Flutter in this hands-on course.
courseDescription: You’ll learn to build cross-platform mobile apps from scratch using React Native and Flutter. Covering app architecture, UI/UX principles, and publishing to app stores. Includes project work and internship.
requirements: Basic programming knowledge. B2 English level. Strong interest in mobile tech recommended.

title: Data Science & Python
shortDescription: Master data analysis and machine learning using Python, Pandas, and scikit-learn.
courseDescription: Covers data manipulation, visualization, statistics, and machine learning with Python. Tools include Jupyter, Pandas, Matplotlib, scikit-learn. Work on real-world datasets and capstone project.
requirements: Strong interest in data. Math skills helpful. B2 level English required.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
shortDescription: Protect systems and data by understanding cybersecurity basics and best practices.
courseDescription: Topics include network security, authentication, encryption, vulnerabilities, ethical hacking, and compliance. Learn tools like Wireshark, Kali Linux, and more.
requirements: Basic IT knowledge. High school diploma and B2 English required.

title: AI & Machine Learning
shortDescription: Dive into AI development, neural networks, and ML pipelines with Python.
courseDescription: Covers supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, TensorFlow, and AI project lifecycle. Includes building predictive models and solving real-world problems.
requirements: Python knowledge preferred. Math background helpful. English proficiency (B2).

title: Cloud Architecture
shortDescription: Design and deploy scalable cloud systems using AWS, Azure, and GCP.
courseDescription: Learn cloud fundamentals, architecture design, security, and best practices across AWS, Azure, and GCP. Develop hands-on labs and cloud-native projects.
requirements: Basic IT/cloud knowledge. Interest in architecture & infrastructure. B2 English.
